sim.author: Josh Davidson/Octal450 (Flight Dynamics, Systems, Instruments), Gary Neely/Buckaroo (3D, Textures, Instruments)

binding.script: setprop("/controls/engines/engine[0]/throttle", getprop("/controls/engines/engine[0]/throttle") + 0.01); setprop("/controls/engines/engine[1]/throttle", getprop("/controls/engines/engine[0]/throttle") + 0.01); # Not a typo, always use engine[0] as a reference

setprop("/controls/engines/engine[0]/throttle", getprop("/controls/engines/engine[0]/throttle") - 0.01); setprop("/controls/engines/engine[1]/throttle", getprop("/controls/engines/engine[0]/throttle") - 0.01); # Not a typo, always use engine[0] as a reference

setprop("/controls/engines/engine[0]/throttle", getprop("/controls/engines/engine[0]/throttle") - 0.01); setprop("/controls/engines/engine[1]/throttle", getprop("/controls/engines/engine[0]/throttle") - 0.01); # Not a typo, always use engine[0] as a reference

setprop("/controls/engines/engine[0]/throttle", getprop("/controls/engines/engine[0]/throttle") + 0.01); setprop("/controls/engines/engine[1]/throttle", getprop("/controls/engines/engine[0]/throttle") + 0.01); # Not a typo, always use engine[0] as a reference
